content.raw: I tweaked the keyboard plugin a bit on  b9c0f6f, feel free to merge in whatever looks reasonable.
content.html: I tweaked the keyboard plugin a bit on b9c0f6f, feel free to merge in whatever looks reasonable.

update.description:
* need [this pull request from gazebo_models](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/177/aerodynamics-models/diff)
* redo pull request #2010 without the `keyhit` detector containing LGPL code
* ~~Need [this pull request for models](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/177/aerodynamics-models/diff).~~
* Adding a world file with the Cessna model and the liftDrag plugin. Controlled cessna flight by adding lift drag plugin response to control surface joint (cl only for now)
* change drag and re-orient sensor data before sending out to SIM_Gazebo
* use actual rotor speed by reducing rotorVelocitySlowdownSim from 10 to 1, and got rid of vertical and yaw coupling by adjusting cla and cda.
* [video](https://youtu.be/n_M5Vs5FBGY)
update.title: Aerodynamic updates

content.raw:
Note that ArduCopter plugin blocks gzserver until connection is established with ardupilot, hence the black screen. Maybe it's better to not block the server but just forcefully pause simulation instead. 

There are some instructions on setting up ardupilot in `iris_standoff_demo.world`. Oh and maybe we can rename it to just `iris_demo.world`?
content.html:
Note that ArduCopter plugin blocks gzserver until connection is established with ardupilot, hence the black screen. Maybe it's better to not block the server but just forcefully pause simulation instead.

There are some instructions on setting up ardupilot in iris_standoff_demo.world. Oh and maybe we can rename it to just iris_demo.world?

content.raw: This doesn't need to be a member, right?
content.html: This doesn't need to be a member, right?

content.raw: It would also be possible to use `ign-transport` instead
content.html: It would also be possible to use ign-transport instead

content.raw:
currently thinking of a couple alternatives:

  - make gazebo publish keystrokes captured by GUI as an option
  - write a new GUI plugin that does above

any suggestions on other approaches to key captures in gazebo? thanks.
